books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: The latest installment in the Women’s Murder Club series. Detective Lindsay Boxer searches for a killer in San Francisco.
books.name: THE 17TH SUSPECT

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: Amos Decker, known as the Memory Man, puts his talents toward solving a string of murders in a Rust Belt town.
books.name: THE FALLEN

books.author: by Dean Koontz
books.description: The rogue F.B.I. agent Jane Hawk is on the lam from the government and a secret group causing a rash of murder-suicides.
books.name: THE CROOKED STAIRCASE

books.author: by Mary Kay Andrews
books.description: An eccentric millionaire enlists the attorney Brooke Trappnell to fix old wrongs, which sets up a potential scandal and murder.
books.name: THE HIGH TIDE CLUB

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: The 28th book in the Prey series. A federal marshal looks into the actions of a member of the Senate Intelligence Committee.
books.name: TWISTED PREY

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher tracks down the owner of a pawned West Point class ring and stumbles upon a large criminal enterprise.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LINE

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: In this psychological thriller by the author of “The Girl on the Train,” drowned women are found in an English river town.
books.name: INTO THE WATER

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Amanda Quick
books.description: Adelaide Blake escapes a private sanitarium and takes refuge in a 1930s seaside resort town where Hollywood players vacation and a psychic is murdered.
books.name: THE OTHER LADY VANISHES

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: A former prisoner of war returns from Vietnam and moves his family to Alaska, where they face tough conditions.
books.name: THE GREAT ALONE

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: by Michael Ondaatje
books.description: In Britain after World War II, a pair of teenage siblings are taken under the tutelage of a mysterious man and his cronies who served during the war.
books.name: WARLIGHT

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A search for stolen rare manuscripts leads to a Florida island.
books.name: CAMINO ISLAND

books.author: by Susan Stoker
books.description: The eighth book in the Delta Force Heroes series. A soldier and a telemarketer take their relationship to the next level.
books.name: RESCUING WENDY

books.author: by Shari Lapena
books.description: A couple’s secrets emerge after their baby disappears.
books.name: THE COUPLE NEXT DOOR
